title: Bank rate on overnight loans is federal funds

content.question: Which of the following accurately describes the federal funds rate?

choices.label: The interest rate that banks charge state governments
The interest rate that banks charge other banks for overnight loans
The interest rate that banks pay on long-term savings
The interest rate on personal loans
The interest rate on government bonds

content.answer: The interest rate that banks charge other banks for overnight loans

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
